data.title: Pelicans vs Hornets scores & predictions
data.meta_description: New Orleans Pelicans - Charlotte Hornets game starts on Jan 18, 2024 at 1:00:00 AM UTC. Follow the game on Sofascore with live scores and statistics.
data.text:
New Orleans Pelicans is playing against Charlotte Hornets on Jan 18, 2024 at 1:00:00 AM UTC.

The game is played at Smoothie King Center.

This game is part of NBA.

Here you can find previous New Orleans Pelicans vs Charlotte Hornets results sorted by their H2H games. Sofascore also allows you to check different information regarding the match, such as:

Box score (points and rebounds)

Detailed stats for each quarter

Player statistics

Head to head streaks

Team streaks

Current odds and predictions

Sofascore community votes on which team is more likely to win the game

New Orleans Pelicans - Charlotte Hornets video highlights are collected in the Media tab for the most popular matches as soon as videos appear on video hosting sites like Youtube or Dailymotion.
